attacks.name: Attract Current
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Multi Pulse
attacks.effect: If Jolteon has 3 or more different types of basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
